attributes.action: reduce the cost of diesel and petrol.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK has the most expensive diesel in the world. Diesel has risen by over 24% in the past 12 months. 2/3 of the price of a litre of diesel is tax. We are even charged VAT on the fuel tax we pay! The price of diesel MUST be reduced, either by means of a tax cut or by Government subsidy. 

Businesses are struggling. Prices are rising as companies are faced with escalating fuel costs. Something has to be done before it is no longer viable for smaller businesses to exist.

We, the public, must continue to voice our dissatisfaction. If enough of us complain, eventually somebody will have to sit up and take notice.
